Our hotel's meeting room is ready to serve you with nearly 736 square feet and seating for 40. We also have a Business Center providing printing services and free Wi-Fi access. We can help plan your event or meeting.

Sweetgrass Meeting Room

Our Sweetgrass Meeting Room is ready to serve you with nearly 700 square feet and seating for 55. We also have a Business Center providing printing services and free Wi-Fi access. We can help plan your event or meeting.
